issue.title: [CF 942] Multi-Rune Cooldown Condition
issue.body:
HI,

Hope i am asking this in the correct area. Ive been looking through help guides/tutorials for a few days now and have yet to figure out if this is possible or not.

I am trying to develop a TMW icon for Plague Leech that follows the following logic.

IF( 2 or more runes are on cool down, IF( Plague Leech is usable, IF( OR(Blood Plague Duration<= 3.5s, Outbreak = Usable), show Plague Leech))))

I have the back part of the if structure constructed, which i have pasted below. I have not been able to figure out how to configure TWM to determine if two or more runes are currently on cool down though. Is there a simple way to do that? I know you could do it through a logic tree checking each run against every other rune, but that seems ill-efficient. Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Current Plague Leech export:

^1^T^SType^Scooldown ^SName^SPlague~`Leech;~`Outbreak ^SManaCheck^B ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SMANAUSABLE ^SChecked^B ^SOperator^S<= ^SUnit^Starget ^SName^SPlague~`Leech ^SLevel^N1 ^SPrtsBefore^N1 ^t^N2^T ^SType^SDEBUFFDUR ^SChecked^B ^SOperator^S<= ^SUnit^Starget ^SName^SBlood~`Plague ^SLevel^N3.5 ^SPrtsBefore^N1 ^t^N3^T ^SType^SMANAUSABLE ^SPrtsAfter^N2 ^SName^SOutbreak ^SAndOr^SOR ^t^Sn^N3 ^t^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STexts^T ^N2^S ^t^t^t^SEnabled^B ^t^N62602^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

Thanks for your help


> Posted by CurseForge user randiriel | Imported from CurseForge issue #942 | Raw

comments.body:
Add this as a Lua condition:

``` (GetRuneCount(1)+GetRuneCount(2)+GetRuneCount(3)+GetRuneCount(4)+GetRuneCount(5)+GetRuneCount(6)) <= 4 ```

Result:

^1^T^SType^Scooldown ^SName^SPlague~`Leech;~`Outbreak ^SManaCheck^B ^SConditions^T ^N1^T ^SType^SLUA ^SName^S(GetRuneCount(1)+GetRuneCount(2)+GetRuneCount(3)+GetRuneCount(4)+GetRuneCount(5)+GetRuneCount(6))~`<=~`4 ^t^N2^T ^SType^SMANAUSABLE ^SChecked^B ^SOperator^S<= ^SUnit^Starget ^SName^SPlague~`Leech ^SLevel^N1 ^t^N3^T ^SType^SDEBUFFDUR ^SChecked^B ^SOperator^S<= ^SUnit^Starget ^SName^SBlood~`Plague ^SLevel^N3.5 ^SPrtsBefore^N1 ^t^N4^T ^SType^SMANAUSABLE ^SPrtsAfter^N1 ^SName^SOutbreak ^SAndOr^SOR ^t^Sn^N4 ^t^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sicon^T ^STexts^T ^N2^S ^t^t^t^SEnabled^B ^t^N70075^S~`~| ^Sicon^^
